instruction:
Tell me which MITRE mitigation is referred to in the following description:

Perform regular software updates to mitigate exploitation risk.

Possible answers:
A. Network Segmentation, B. Restrict Web-Based Content, C. User Training, D. Update Software

parsed_raw_data.question:
Tell me which MITRE mitigation is referred to in the following description:

Perform regular software updates to mitigate exploitation risk.
parsed_raw_data.options: A. Network Segmentation, B. Restrict Web-Based Content, C. User Training, D. Update Software

instruction:
Q: Tell me which MITRE mitigation is referred to in the following description:

Prevent access to file shares, remote access to systems, unnecessary services. Mechanisms to limit access may include use of network concentrators, RDP gateways, etc.

Options:
A. Limit Access to Resource Over Network, B. SSL/TLS Inspection, C. Privileged Process Integrity, D. Filter Network Traffic
output: A. Limit Access to Resource Over Network

parsed_raw_data.question:
Tell me which MITRE mitigation is referred to in the following description:

Prevent access to file shares, remote access to systems, unnecessary services. Mechanisms to limit access may include use of network concentrators, RDP gateways, etc.
parsed_raw_data.options: A. Limit Access to Resource Over Network, B. SSL/TLS Inspection, C. Privileged Process Integrity, D. Filter Network Traffic
parsed_raw_data.choice: A. Limit Access to Resource Over Network

instruction:
Which MITRE ATT&CK mitigation is described in the following:
Remove or deny access to unnecessary and potentially vulnerable software to prevent abuse by adversaries.

Possible answers:
A. Privileged Account Management, B. Disable or Remove Feature or Program, C. Application Developer Guidance, D. Data Backup
output: B. Disable or Remove Feature or Program

parsed_raw_data.question:
Which MITRE ATT&CK mitigation is described in the following:
Remove or deny access to unnecessary and potentially vulnerable software to prevent abuse by adversaries.
parsed_raw_data.options: A. Privileged Account Management, B. Disable or Remove Feature or Program, C. Application Developer Guidance, D. Data Backup
parsed_raw_data.choice: B. Disable or Remove Feature or Program
